mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_DATE , O.TOTAL_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_NAME , PO.PRODUCT_ORDER_AMOUNT , O.ORDER_TYPE , PO.PRODUCT_ORDER_PRICE , PY.PAYMENT_TYPE , PY.PAYMENT_PRICE , D.DELIVERY_STATUS , AD.ADDRESS_DETAIL , AD.ADDRESS_NAME , AD.ADDRESS_PHONE FROM T_ORDER O LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT_ORDER PO ON PO.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN T_SELL_PRODUCT SP ON SP.SELL_PRODUCT_ID = PO.SELL_PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_CODE = SP.PRODUCT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_PAYMENT OPY ON OPY.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN T_DELIVERY D ON D.PRODUCT_ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN T_ADDRESS AD ON O.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN T_PAYMENT PY ON PY.PAYMENT_NO = OPY.PAYMENT_NO WHERE O.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
